dcterms:creator: K. Bache
M. Lichman
dcterms:description: The Mushroom Dataset contains 8124 instances of gilled mushrooms from 23 different species in the Agaricus and Lepiota family, each described by 22 discrete attributes (e.g., color, odor, ring type) and whether the mushroom is poisonous or edible (51.8% of all instances are edible).
dcterms:title: Mushroom Dataset
